comments-01: In the postbuild script, we replace all occurrences of the absolute
path `/_astro/..` with a relative path leading up to the same file.
We do this so that this project can be,served from a subdirectory,
as well. For example, running,a webserver in any of the paths
leading up to the docs,directory, and visiting the docs directory
will serve the,expected pages and resources.,`cd ./docs/../../;
python3 -m http.server` will serve this,app at the URL
http://127.0.0.1/x/docs/ and all the links,in the resulting app will
work as expected. The,find_exactdepth command is defined by .envrc,
scripts.postbuild: touch ./docs/.nojekyll; for ((depth = 0; depth < 7; ++depth)) ; do dotslashes=''; level=$((depth-1 < 0 ? 0 : depth-1)); dotslashes=$(printf %*s $level | sed 's^ ^../^g'); find_exactdepth $depth ./docs/ -type f -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 --no-run-if-empty sed 's^/_astro/^'$dotslashes'_astro/^g' -i ; done
